description: A youkai in the form of a man with long hair. He is seen 400 years ago with Hagoromo Gitsune and also in a church. He is now with Hagoromo Gitsune. He fought Daruma 400 years ago. He attack the Keikain along his insect youkai minion. He uses a massive attack that is in the form of a cross and he wield a cross spear. He can turn into a form where his eyes and body became those of a bee, growing a pair of giant mosquito wings, with hands similar to those of a praying mantis. According to the Keikain report, Shoukera is a yokai who reports the sins of a human to Heaven. Legend said that Shoukera come forth once every 60 days on "Koushin", the 57th day. He is an insect yokai who ascends to heaven and reports all the human`s sin while they are sleeping to heaven. Heaven then takes the lives of those who have sinned. This is why people must not sleep on the day of Koushin. To avoid this, one would spend the entire day praying to a statue of the raging god, Shoumen Kongou. He didn`t show up in the castle along with the other heads and is the first of all the heads to be killed.
name: Shoukera
